website_summaries.verdict: National Geographic hit it out of the park with their combo craft and STEM learning kit, as making glowing slime and testing thermal-based color change putty is fun and educational too.
pros: Experiment and play with 8 weird types of putties and slimes

customer_reviews.title: Not safe with younger children in the family
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these slime kits for my two 10-year old grandsons and was happy to see that they were listed as being 100% safe for kids and adults. However, when they arrived I noticed all the warnings on the boxes for small parts (magnets and batteries), also contains chemicals which present a hazard to health and should not come in contact with the mouth and eyes. With younger children (ages 5 and 2) in both households, I cannot in good conscience give this gift to my older grandsons. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KateM

customer_reviews.title: A real disappointment
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, there were several different kinds of slime and putty. However, there were no instructions about how to make the glow in the dark putty glow (it didn't glow), and the color changing slime did not change color. The video the instructions said kids should watch before experimenting was a dead link so no video. There was little actual experimentation or instructions. Limited fun and little education. Very disappointing. Little value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: AudreyS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a preschool and we experimented with all of the slime and putty. The biggest hit was the snotty and liquid slime. They loved making the slime as well as exploring with the glow in dark putty. The learning guide that was provided was very helpful. Overall the children loved it, the clean-up was easy and they can't wait to explore with it some more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Tell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slime and putty kit!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I would one day write that headline? Well... now everyone I know has kids. This was an amazing value with 4 putty's and 4 slime's included! The putty's all feel great, and have different special abilities like magnetic, glow in the dark, and even color changing. The slime's were a lot of fun too! And there is even an educational guide included. Great item for birthday parties or holiday gift. I got this for my nephew. He loved it. He's been playing with this for days.
customer_reviews.author: DC1717

customer_reviews.title: Great slime & putty! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review almost a year after purchasing for my son who turned 7 when we gave this to him. The only ones that have gotten a little hard are bouncy putty, and the make your own slime it comes with gets old (like normal homemade slime.) My son lives the magnetic putty and the magnet it comes with. The glow in the dark putty comes with a little black light. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: meliss325

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite as Advertised but Still Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set. He really loves the glow in the dark and the bouncing putty. We have tried all sorts of things including a warm light bulb to make the color change on the green putty and it does not change. The magnetic putty sticks to the magnet but it does not behave like the one in the pictures. No slime climbing up to reach the magnet. My son is pleased. I'm happy he is happy but wish everything did what they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 year old for Christmas. He loved playing with it!! Fast forward 2 months to March. The slime that comes in the metal tins (magnetic, color change, and glow in the dark) are somehow sealed shut and do not open. I tried scissors, a knife, pliers, and lids no longer come off😣. So frustrating that for $25 half of the slime is garbage. All of the slime should be in the easy to open plastic containers.
customer_reviews.author: jackiep

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: When I read “Slime & Putty Lab”, I thought it would come with more “mixers” to create them. Well, there’s only one where you actually mix it to create slime. The slime you do make smelled DISGUSTING. We wouldn’t even let our 10 year old play with it. She wasn’t even disappointed with that decision because she thought it smelled horrible, too. If you’re kid is looking to make slime or putty, don’t get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Was Christmas gift - Comes with premade slime and putty as well as the ingredients to make one slime recipe. Interesting information booklet along with. Fun for kids to play with the different kinds of slime and putty, and clean up was easy. Actually able to reuse / play with again, the containers keep the product pliable.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Younger child with help might get more out of it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old cousin spent about 3 hours with this kit. She is in 4th grade and it kept her entertained for part of an afternoon. She reads at 5th grade level so that may account for how the little amount of time she spent. She whipped through it so fast that, for the money, it wasn't worth it. Probably would have been better for a younger child who would have taken more time with it. The magnet portion was the piece that had follow through required but once the experiment was completed the kit was passe. However she hung onto the slime thus 4 stars instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit
customer_reviews.text: If your kid likes slime and putty, this is the gift for them. The containers aren't too small, so the gift is substantial. There are some projects and some that can be played with right out of the container. Hours of entertainment for ages 5-12. Would make an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: E Family E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, expensive for quality
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because my son was super excited. Probably one of his favorite Christmas gifts. Took off a few stars because a few of the slimes were issuesque. One was partially opened when we opened the box so it was pretty much hard and useable. Another putty was very hard and wouldn’t change colors at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Science Activities with High Interest Level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this STEM educational set for my 7 year old grandson. We used it for a science project during home school and it was engaging and well put together. It come with a book of experiments and includes about 8 different kinds of putty and slime containers plus a magnet and a small black light for the activities. I’d recommend it for ages 4-12.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Hoff

customer_reviews.title: More like glue instead of slime
customer_reviews.text: This product has some somewhat cool things we liked the magnetic slime however the fluffy and boogers slime was like pure GLUE! My daughter had it all over her hands and couldn’t get it off. It was bizarre. Went straight into the trash as it would ruin anything it got into. Don’t buy, pick a different kit and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bellaboo59

customer_reviews.title: My Grandkids LOVED this gift!
customer_reviews.text: When the kids unwrapped the gift, they immediately started plotting when they'd use it and what colors they wanted to choose. They described their slimy fun in detail and I was thrilled to have given them something that they could experiment with and create something special that they were able to play with. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pcushenan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set & Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! He wanted magnetic putty, and this was a really nice giftable set with not only the Magnetic Putty but several other different kinds as well. The magnet for the putty was large and cool looking , and he loved all of the other types of putty/slime too. They all come in nice tins and store well in the box for repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: AllAboutMimi

customer_reviews.title: Great so far...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew was quite excited when he unwrapped this! I can't speak to how well it works but I will ask him for an update next time I see him.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Lots of funny slimy things to explore
customer_reviews.text: I liked this putty and slime kit because it was more of an exploration rather than a kit with loose powder and ingredients to make slime. Less of a mess. Daughter loved it. The glow in the dark slime really worked. Magnetic putty is magnetic but the magnet is a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2828

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced at $22 for the lightning deal.... Don't think I would repurchase after seeing how little comes inside. Kids enjoyed opening the kit, but have only gone back to play with it once in the last 6 months. My kids prefer to make their own slime from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: A.Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! No mess, no headache. Worth it even for older kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! 17 year old loves it, no kidding. Best part was there was no mess because only one type came unmade. The rest were exactly how they were described and are kept like new in the individual tins. She still keeps them tidy in the original box too 😂
customer_reviews.author: Steffani Mains

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my little cousin
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize everything came made already. I was actually hoping for a make your own slime kit, but he LOVED this! All different kinds of slime, and he played with it through the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun slime kit
customer_reviews.text: Fun slime kit. Got for my six year old. He loved the different types of slime. The magnetic is his favorite. They keep well if you put them back in their tins. We have him keep them on the kitchen table to avoid a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old approved! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter really enjoyed this kit. Most of the putty or slime come pre-made and only one of them requires you to mix it yourself. I appreciated this because it was less mess than I had anticipated, but just be aware if you are wanting it to be more hands on. The different types of putty do provide that scientific exploration and fun even if they do not get to make it themself. I would recommend this for anyone whose child enjoys slime, putty, and/or experimenting!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C. Kabbes

customer_reviews.title: If you like a mess, these are for you!
customer_reviews.text: What a mess these make. Never a big fan of slime and this confirmed I still don't like slim. My kids loved them but for me, they raised my blood pressure. Maybe as a gift to some one else, they would be good. I bought on treasure truck so price was good.
customer_reviews.author: ecmomma

customer_reviews.title: Kid ❤️, mom approved
customer_reviews.text: My 6YO loves this kit. It comes with different types in its own container. There is also a booklet to explain the different types but my child would rather play with it than read about it. It doesn’t make a mess and does not discolor fabrics which is what I was concerned with
customer_reviews.author: C. Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for a budding scientist
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off the truck for a Christmas present for my grandson. He is only 5 and the box says for 8 years old. But it has been a great opportunity for me to work with him on the experiments. I didn't realize there were so many types of slime and putty. We're having a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Different and fun activity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 and 7 year old nephews to keep them occupied for a bit with something other than an iPad. They loved it and it kept them busy. Not sure what the educational value is besides fostering creativity and experimentation.
customer_reviews.author: RJ20

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Some of the products were already dried out upon opening. My daughter lost interest almost immediately after opening. The packaging is very appealing but the product is nothing special. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: robert crawford

customer_reviews.title: Number one gift for slime lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters birthday and I like it as much as she does. It has such good variety of slimes and even better, it's a nice education element with science of it all. Love testing out the different slimes with her. Just think I should of bought 2 lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, not excellent
customer_reviews.text: Overall great gift for my 3yo. Fun and very interesting. However, some of the products that came with it were very sticky and I ended up throwing away. We made the slime that came with it, not the best ever but overall decent
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Owens

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This item was so far over priced. As well as all the skins are so wet you can’t even handle them!!!!!!!! It’s horrible! TheY stick to your whole hand to the point you can’t even touch them. I grew up with National Geographic magazines, loved the company but expected so much more. So disappointed and my son is so sad that I made him throw it all away. DO NOT PURCHASE !!!
customer_reviews.author: brittney k. graeber

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this product is $30 worthy. Maybe $10. My 6 year old wasn’t even impressed. He said “I thought this would be cooler”. Magnetic putty is a joke and doesn’t stretch apart like the pictures show. The color changing putty gets a little lighter in color, nothing special. The slices are so sticky you can’t get them off your hands. The bouncy putty is okay but not very “bouncy”. The water slime is nice and cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Santama

customer_reviews.title: Engaging Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nephews and nieces for Christmas and they were ecstatic. They all claimed to having fun creating the various slimes and putty and their parents said it wasn’t too messy. Definitely an engaging gift for youngsters.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old son. He absolutely loved it! It was the first thing he had to open and play with. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who is a National Geographic fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni French

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety of slime, packaged well, no smell
customer_reviews.text: I loved how all the different types of slime came in colorful containers with labels. There was no weird smell to them at all. The bouncy slime was my favorite because it felt so soft. The glow in the dark slime worked really well in a dark room or with the included mini flashlight. My kids loved the snotty slime and liquid slime the best! All in all, this would be a great gift for any boy or girl that loves slime. The little booklet included a description of each slime as well as some easy home experiments to do.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My sister home schools her children, so I try to gift some items that they think will be cool that are also educational. This counts towards their science project + cool auntie points, what kids don't love some slime?? Score!
customer_reviews.author: Abell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a favorite gift for our 6yr old. She loved all the varieties and plays with it often. The only issue we had was the make your own slime grew mold and we did boil the water first. Other than that, we absolutely love the kit and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lionspurr Loudly

customer_reviews.title: So awesome 👏🏼
customer_reviews.text: What a joy to teach our son science with National Geo! We love it! At 3 we are doing everything with him but he already has a huge love for science and loves reading the pamphlets with us! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a box!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun for my 10 yr old. I was afraid the smell would be strong or make your hands smell but it wasn't bad. Got it on a deal otherwise don't think I would've purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Baxter

customer_reviews.title: AWESOMENESS
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome! I was extremely nervous to spend so much on a slime set but its totally worth it. This has some of the coolest slime I've ever seen and as a parent I'm not a huge slime fan. Haha! But this is definitely cool cool cool
customer_reviews.author: keitha graham

customer_reviews.title: 1st impressions not always 💯
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my gson for Christmas n it was a huge success, he made the slime n played with the other ones it came with, the problem started the week after he had it, the slime grew this weird white mold like substance so we tried to mix it thinking that the white stuff was normal, it just turned into a wet goopy mass of yuk, we had to throw out the whole thing, sad because it’s a very cool concept..
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great slime and putty kit, even for the kid who has it all
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my daughter and she loves it. There are several different types of slime and putty and the variations keep it fun. Read the directions before trying to use the powder. It's not obvious as to what to do with it. Great kit and would totally buy again -- I mean, ask Santa to buy it again! :)
customer_reviews.author: owsinsomnia

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love slime!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved this slime and putty kit. My grandson especially loved the magnetic putty. The glowing putty is pretty cool too. I made sure they washed their hands after playing with it. It was a fun Christmas gift. The price was reasonable. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sarah5450

customer_reviews.title: Unique slimes and putties!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 10-year-old was going to lose her mind when she received this. Lost of fun and different slimes and putties. I will say she wishes there were more slimes, but that’s just her obsess right now, lol! Definitely worth it for a slime loving kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: ncGentry

customer_reviews.title: Fun AND educational—totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. The slimes are all different and so cool. It comes with an educational booklet and some suggested experiments. With the current slime craze, it’s a great set that has several different kinds of slime and is also informative and educational, in a fun way. The liquid and magnetic slimes are especially cool. If your kid loves slime and/or science, get this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McGlone Vonderschmitt

customer_reviews.title: Not really a lab
customer_reviews.text: This kit only has one thing to make. The rest is things in containers. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: VERY cool! A bit overpriced (national geographic name on the box) also, some of.the potties are much firmer than expected and the color change putty changes slowly over time after kneading so the effect is much less striking than I initially believed it would be. Over all worth it. My daughter LOVES this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: keirissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 and 8 year old boys had a lot of fun playing with this slime. There are a lot of different textures and they have spent a lot of time playing with these over the last few weeks. The favorites are the glow in the dark slime and the liquid slime. The temperature changing slime unfortunately did not work for us, but everything else was great.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Comes as Advertised.  National Geographic never disappoints this family!
customer_reviews.text: I certainly am not a ‘slime’ expert but this fit well with the other gifts! All were National Geographic. You won’t be disappointed and neither will the kids who wanted ‘slime’!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Super popular gift for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was a MEGA hit for Christmas gifts to teen grandkids! They made a party of it immediately Christmas night with all the cousins around the table. What is so magical about slime?!
customer_reviews.author: Siberianpeachpie

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a 7 year old for his bday and all the kids were playing with it! Sooo much fun! It is exactly as advertised. I would def purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of my daughter brought this to school and she wanted for her right away. The magnet slime was a bit disappointing but overall they were fun and even after three months she still plays with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenia

customer_reviews.title: Intriguing!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was quite expensive with a handful of slimes and putties. My 8 and 6 year old daughters are somehow so intrigued by them. We ended up spending hours reading and exploring the physics behind these slimes and putties. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of types of slime.
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic slime did not work with magnets and the color change slime did not change even right in front if the heater or in the fridge. The glow in the dark slime was a lot if fun though.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Knezevich

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product! Fun for little ones as well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my 3.5 year old who is obsessed with slime and it is a huge hit! Because the recommended age is 8, I was prepared for it to be too advanced for his age, but it’s perfect for him. His twin sister and 7 y/o brother love it as well. The slime/putty are well stored in sturdy tins and containers so as not to dry up. While my kids play with it for long periods of time, I can’t imagine it would be that entertaining for an older child. But overall this is a top quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jill G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for 13 year old
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a 13th Birthday gift for a girl that I mentor, and she LOVES it! We got to play with it together at the library, and it really is fun and cool having all the different options to play and experiment with!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very interesting and very educational
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter was really excited to have this gift, she’s made putty and slime several time. It’s a great educational tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my little brother's favorite present! He is 14. I got to explain all the science behind it while he played. I think he told me that they dried out like 3-4 months after he played with them all the time. I'm in my 20's and I had fun playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love it 5 years old!
customer_reviews.text: My girl love it, was impress to see how many thing has to experiment with, lovely set! great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Preuss II

customer_reviews.title: How could you go wrong with slime and kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great product... Kids loved playing wythe slime. There are eight containers so multiple children can play at once. Love the learning guided that comes with these. Children play and learn about science all at once. The children live the magnetic putty. Great that the magnet is included. Great gift or just a great time to spend with your children.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Only get to make one slime, and it was not great at all. My daughter threw it out. The rest are premise, which she was a bit sad about. But they are nice quality slime and putty.
customer_reviews.author: Fenix

customer_reviews.title: Very hard and stiff putty and slime
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the quality, my putty and slime is so hard , unable to play with, the purpose of it died for it being so stiff. The magnetic one is like hardest one as it doesn’t even move with the magnet at all. I paid $30 and its gone into waist wish i had bought some other cheap ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Omer Awan

customer_reviews.title: 5 *s
customer_reviews.text: got 2 for granddaughters for Christmas and that is all they played with. Seems goop is really in..... HA. who knew. Even magnetic goop. Well done product.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont artist

customer_reviews.title: Slime & Putty for the Win
customer_reviews.text: My child loved this gift for Christmas. He is big on slimes and putty so it was a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: QueenRinda

customer_reviews.title: Clean and non messy
customer_reviews.text: Very good slime. My daughter loves slime but I dont. This stuff is not messy. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality kit.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of slime and putty was awful. The fluffy slime stuck to everything. The bouncing putty hardly bounced. I bought it is a gift and all I heard was that this was a rip-off and horrible kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Kemp

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. when we made slime first day it was okay but after few days it became water.. I had to throw this one out but other slimes are good and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for my kid
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 years old and loved this gift I got him. He spent hours playing with it and was able to share with his friends at school. Now they've all bought it and have fun afternoons messing around with what they can create! I highly recommend this for kids! No more ipad zombies!!!
customer_reviews.author: rp8818

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome item we had so much fun with this. I got it fory 11 year old daughter but all of my kids even myself were just amazed by it.....great for the whole family kids from 3-18 we're playing together with this.
customer_reviews.author: candiceelder

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the kiddos for Christmas and it's awesome! The glow in the dark slime seems to be the favorite. Only one of the slime things need mixed and the rest are pre-made!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Swanson

customer_reviews.title: great but it disintegrates super fast
customer_reviews.text: my daughter was having a great time until the puffy slime melted all over her hands, clothes and made a mess. Not something you will want on a slime set. Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Karim Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This toy was on my nephews Christmas and he was very happy when he opened it. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the different kinds of slime. The magnetic and glow in the dark are favorites in this house. They are long lasting and come in containers to preserve freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this! Total hit! Best gift they got For Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: M. Regis

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toys
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for kids to learn different textures of materials. My son likes it very much. It’s a good toy for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my 7 year old daughter she loved it. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Slime/Putty
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have success getting the right consistency of the red slime in the box. However, all the other pre-made slimes and putty's worked like they were supposed to and the kids love working with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cloverleaf

customer_reviews.title: Great putty and slime kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every single slime and putty is AMAZING when used according to the instructions. My 9 and 5 year old spend hours playing with this kit. The “do-it-yourself” red slime comes out as a hot pink color. The more the kids play with it, the better it gets, but they must first mix it for 3-7 minutes. It glows in the dark when used with the UV light. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nyqole

customer_reviews.title: Not what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Not enough slime and no opportunity to actually make slime, which is what the kids wanted
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea for child
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the boy you do to know what to buy. I would say anyone ten and under would enjoy playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: User123

customer_reviews.title: SLIME, SLIME and more SLIME
customer_reviews.text: I like that this comes with lots of different types of slime and putty. Gave as a gift, recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.author: kikiB206

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Slime
customer_reviews.text: Cool slime kit for kids, my daughter really enjoyed the variety of different slimes. She is big into them right now and it seemed she really enjoyed playing with all the different types.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of play time
customer_reviews.text: If you kid loves slime this is a cool kit. My son loves the glowing and the magnetic one. I’m not even going to lie I play with it to lol
customer_reviews.author: ndtrenton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for what it is but very cool and my 8 year old daughter absolutely loved it and still plays with it weeks after her birthday. Makes a great gift for any slime lover.
customer_reviews.author: Cv0818

customer_reviews.title: The kids LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great kit. My kids have been begging for slime forever... The different types of slime was so much fun, they loved it. I love the individual containers for storage and that they could all play at the same time with so many types of slime and putty. The favorite was the magnetic slime.

customer_reviews.title: Fun  gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it and his little brother requested one for his next birthday!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase a cheap set from Walmart next time. The quality of this slime wasn’t all that great and mixing things together creates a mess.

customer_reviews.text: Your kid likes putty and stuff like that, this is a winning bet. They will love it

customer_reviews.title: Best  8 + gift ever!!!

customer_reviews.title: Putty is good, slime is not
customer_reviews.text: The putty was great, but the slime was all very messy. You could only play with it once because it stuck to our hands So much.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but nice
customer_reviews.text: This to me seemed expensive for slime but my 10 year old really likes it and it seems to be of a higher quality than most

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety. The magnetic slime was the biggest hit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 9 year old granddaughter’s birthday. She loves it. Especially the magnet slime. I have played with it with her and it is great fun.

customer_reviews.title: One of best liked presents... not sure why
customer_reviews.text: Had large variety of slime and other quite disgusting contents, but 8 yr old daughter loved it as did cousins, so apparently that's what they like? Went over very well.

customer_reviews.title: Absoulte worthy!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Almost every slime kit I have purchased has been a complete fail but this kit is awesome! My 11 year old gave two thumbs up! Definitely worth the buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of putty and slime. My 10 year old son was thrilled with this. Only one problem, The “fluffy slime” was completely dried out :(

product_meta.title: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC Mega Slime Kit & Putty Lab - 4 Types of Amazing Slime For Girls & Boys Plus 4 Types of Putty Including Magnetic Putty, Fluffy Slime & Glow-in-the-Dark Putty
product_meta.description:
Style:Slime-Putty 8 PackExplore the Squishy, Stretchy, Slippery, Magnetic side of Science with National Geographic!

The Mega Slime & Putty Lab contains eight amazing varieties of slime and putty plus cool accessories. 

What makes putty so stretchable?

Why does slime drip and ooze?

Check out the learning guide for interesting slime and putty facts plus a few simple experiments for kids to try at home. 

This Kit Includes:

• Magnetic Putty, Fluffy Slime
• Glow-in-the-dark Putty, Liquid Slime
• Color Changing Putty
• Snotty Slime
• DIY slime lab with stir stick
• Bouncing Putty
• 8 storage tins
• A full-color 16-page learning guide.

About the National Geographic Society: With a mission to inspire people to care about the Planet, the 131-year-old National Geographic society is one of the world’s largest nonprofit scientific and educational organizations. National Geographic net proceeds support vital exploration, conservation, research, and education programs.
feature_bullets: 8 FASCINATING VARIETIES OF SLIME & PUTTY including premade Magnetic Putty, Fluffy Slime, Glow-in-the-Dark Putty, Liquid Slime, Color Changing Putty, Snotty Slime, Bouncing Putty and 1 DIY Glow-in-the-Dark Slime Lab
WITH STORAGE TINS and ACCESSORIES for a complete Lab kit
EXPLORE THE SCIENCE BEHIND SLIME AND PUTTY with the 16 page, full-color Learning Guide.
QUALITY-TESTED NON-TOXIC FORMULAS are 100% safe for kids and adults.
RESPECTED QUALITY – National Geographic Toys is proud to provide only the highest quality products, each backed by a complete satisfaction guarantee
